Description:
Detects common commands used in Windows webshells

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Webshell Strings
Query: eql select * from _source_ where (cs-method = 'get' and (log like '%=whoami%' or log like '%=net%20user%' or log like '%=net+user%' or log like '%=net%2buser%' or log like '%=cmd%20/c%%' or log like '%=cmd+/c+%' or log like '%=cmd%2b/c%%' or log like '%=cmd%20/r%%' or log like '%=cmd+/r+%' or log like '%=cmd%2b/r%%' or log like '%=cmd%20/k%%' or log like '%=cmd+/k+%' or log like '%=cmd%2b/k%%' or log like '%=powershell%%' or log like '%=powershell+%' or log like '%=tasklist%%' or log like '%=tasklist+%' or log like '%=wmic%%' or log like '%=wmic+%' or log like '%=ssh%%' or log like '%=ssh+%' or log like '%=python%%' or log like '%=python+%' or log like '%=python3%%' or log like '%=python3+%' or log like '%=ipconfig%' or log like '%=wget%%' or log like '%=wget+%' or log like '%=curl%%' or log like '%=curl+%' or log like '%=certutil%' or log like '%=copy%20%5c%5c%' or log like '%=dsquery%%' or log like '%=dsquery+%' or log like '%=nltest%%' or log like '%=nltest+%'))
